title: Trace elements in PM2.5 shed light on Saharan dust incursions over the Munich airshed in spring 2022
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EA00092G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sara Padoan, Alessandro Zappi, Jan Bendl, Tanja Herrmann, Ajit Mudan, Carsten Neukirchen, Erika Brattich, Laura Tositti, Thomas Adam
Munich was persistently affected by Saharan dust in March 2022. PM2.5 was collected on quartz filters and elements were analyzed by ICP-MS. Elemental data were processed by chemometrics and receptor models by Varimax and SOM analysis was applied.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
